scopecontent.p: This is a collection of 40 handwritten sermons, dating from 1850 to 1879. The average length is 25 pages. The sermons appear to be American, mentioning the Constitution and the Continental Congress. Several of the sermons constitute a series of "lectures on the shorter catechism." They are all in the same hand, but the author is unknown.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
